Sunny Deol to host Savdhaan India

Actor and film-maker Sunny Deol will be seen hosting a special episode of the popular crime show Savdhaan India , which will shine a light on the growing number of rape cases in the country.

“He [Deol] was seen telling people around that this show discloses stories that are happening in our country and that he wants promote awareness on these crimes,” said a source from the set.

The episode, which will be aired on January 15, will focus on a girl, who is drugged and raped on a train by a group of boys who pretend to rescue her. — IANS
title: Sunny Deol to host Savdhaan India (TV Snippets)
